__e: You need to know that Agnes is safe. She'll be cared for.
The trouble is, Agnes, nobody can find that black box, nor that marriage contract.
I know you had her best interests at heart, that you were trying to protect her, but now because of you, Agnes is in grave danger.
Why didn't you tell me about Agnes and her daughter?
Agnes, it is very important that you tell us what happened when your dad arrived and found you there.
I think we have to put our feelings aside.
